name: gspann-poc-automation-playwright
repository: Will create and push the code.
author: Atul Gupta <agupta9@lululemon.com>

scripts.test:usa: CRAWL_REGION=USA npx playwright test tests/markdown.spec.ts --project chrome --retries=0
scripts.test:can-en: CRAWL_REGION=CAN-EN npx playwright test tests/markdown.spec.ts --project chrome --retries=0
scripts.test:can-fr: CRAWL_REGION=CAN-FR npx playwright test tests/markdown.spec.ts --project chrome --retries=0
scripts.test:all-locales: npm run test:usa && npm run test:can-en && npm run test:can-fr
scripts.test:markdown:usa: cross-env SECTION=MARKDOWNS CRAWL_REGION=USA npx playwright test tests/markdown.spec.ts --project chrome --retries=0
scripts.test:markdown:can-en: cross-env SECTION=MARKDOWNS CRAWL_REGION=CAN-EN npx playwright test tests/markdown.spec.ts --project chrome --retries=0
scripts.test:markdown:can-fr: cross-env SECTION=MARKDOWNS CRAWL_REGION=CAN-FR npx playwright test tests/markdown.spec.ts --project chrome --retries=0
scripts.test:newness:usa: cross-env SECTION=NEWNESS CRAWL_REGION=USA npx playwright test tests/newness.spec.ts --project chrome --retries=0
scripts.test:newness:can-en: cross-env SECTION=NEWNESS CRAWL_REGION=CAN-EN npx playwright test tests/newness.spec.ts --project chrome --retries=0
scripts.test:newness:can-fr: cross-env SECTION=NEWNESS CRAWL_REGION=CAN-FR npx playwright test tests/newness.spec.ts --project chrome --retries=0
scripts.test:all-markdown: npm run test:markdown:usa && npm run test:markdown:can-en && npm run test:markdown:can-fr
scripts.test:all-newness: npm run test:newness:usa && npm run test:newness:can-en && npm run test:newness:can-fr
